title: A Dangerous Man: Episode 287
description:
Elisa and her sister Kimberley had a difficult childhood, but remained close and always looked out for each other. When she left care at 17, Elisa moved in with her boyfriend Ahmed who had supported her so much. But the relationship deteriorated rapidly and Elisa was soon trapped in a terrible nightmare.

Special Mention: Samantha Sykes Foundation Trust.
